attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone in the UK by the age of 16  should be required to have in their possession an Identification Card with details of indentity including a DNA code - this card should be matched to Passport/Driving licence etc. Thousands maybe hundreds of thousands of crimes already committed would be solved on the fact we have the DNA Register. The crime rate would drop due to the threat of certain DNA proof and tracing. Saving millions in Police investigations.
